title: [K-12] Strengthening Language Education Competencies Through Interest-Based Creative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A program supporting pre-service teachers in designing creative activities leveraging learners' interests in language education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core concepts of IDC theory (interests, creation, habits) to language education design.
Learners can design learner-customized language creation activities using the "imitation-combination-performance" creative cycle.
Learners can develop interest-based language learning scenarios integrating digital tools (BYOD) and offline activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
